Major_Arcs.title: Paul Bunyan and the Circus
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Paul Bunyan's introduction in a circus, his replacement of Matto Grasso as the strong man, and the ensuing conflict and resolution with Grasso's revenge plots, culminating in Paul Bunyan leaving the circus.

sub_scenes.title: Circus is in Town
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of Paul Bunyan's circus act, the news of the circus arrival, and the public's initial reaction to circus animals.

sub_scenes.title: Trouble at the Circus
sub_scenes.description: Conflict arises as Billings confronts Matto Grasso, leading to a fight and chase involving Paul Bunyan.

sub_scenes.title: A New Strong Man
sub_scenes.description: Paul Bunyan unexpectedly defeats Matto Grasso, leading to the circus owner offering him Grasso's job.

narrative_arcs.title: Owner's Explanation and Revelation of Identity
Offering a New Role: The Strong Man

sub_scenes.title: Revenge by Fire
sub_scenes.description: Matto Grasso plots revenge, setting the circus tent on fire, but Paul Bunyan quickly extinguishes it.

narrative_arcs.title: Paul Bunyan's Circus Debut and Grasso's Envy
Grasso's Revenge Plan: Kerosene and Fire
Fire in the Arena and Bunyan's Control

sub_scenes.title: Revenge by Ape
sub_scenes.description: Grasso attempts revenge again by releasing an ape, but Paul Bunyan recaptures it and Grasso is chased.

narrative_arcs.title: Grasso's Renewed Frustration and Ape Release Plan
The Chase for the Culprit Begins
Desperate Attempts to Thwart Paul Bunyan in the Arena

sub_scenes.title: Unplanned Circus Act
sub_scenes.description: A large man confronts Sonny, leading to an unexpected trapeze act witnessed by confused spectators.

narrative_arcs.title: Challenge and Boast in the Circus Ring

sub_scenes.title: Resolution and Departure
sub_scenes.description: Sonny is rescued from the trapeze, captured, and Paul Bunyan rejects a job offer, choosing to leave the circus.

Major_Arcs.title: Anthology of Tales
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc compiles several distinct tales: Marco Polo's adventure, the story of a severed talking head, and the journey to Princess Lotus culminating in a witch's castle encounter and escape.

sub_scenes.title: Marco Polo's Tibet Adventure
sub_scenes.description: Introduction to Marco Polo's perilous adventures and his encounter with the Ogress of Tibet.

narrative_arcs.title: Marco Polo and the Ogress of Tibet

sub_scenes.title: The Talking Head
sub_scenes.description: A man on horseback discovers a talking severed head in a forest, leading to a magical gift and a new quest.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery of Talking Head and Plea for Help
Gratitude and a Gift of a Sacred Dagger
Direction Towards Princess Lotus and Farewell

sub_scenes.title: Journey to Princess Lotus
sub_scenes.description: The man on horseback journeys towards Princess Lotus, arriving at a mourning city.

narrative_arcs.title: Audience with the Mourning King and the Tale of Princess Lotus
Encounter with a Weeping Woman in Distress
Plea for Help and Journey to a Suspect Castle

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation with the Ogress
sub_scenes.description: Marco and the weeping woman enter a castle which turns out to be the ogress's lair, leading to conflict.

narrative_arcs.title: Entering the Castle and the Witch's 'Pets'
Transformation and Revelation of the Ogress
Confrontation with Tusked Mice and Ogress's Claws

sub_scenes.title: Ogress's Traps
sub_scenes.description: The Ogress attacks Marco with fire and snakes, capturing him.

sub_scenes.title: Escape from Captivity
sub_scenes.description: Marco and Princess Lotus are held captive, but Marco uses the magic dagger to escape and confront the Ogress.

sub_scenes.title: Resolution with Princess Lotus
sub_scenes.description: Marco and Princess Lotus escape, reunite with her father, and Marco is offered marriage as a reward.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at Mourning City and Palace

Major_Arcs.title: The Treasure Tale
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc tells a tale of buried treasure, betrayal, revenge, and its tragic consequences.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to the Treasure Tale
sub_scenes.description: The Treasure Keeper introduces a tale of treasure linked to yarn, gold, violence, and death.

sub_scenes.title: Prison Setting
sub_scenes.description: A prisoner in a penal colony is urged to cooperate with the Captain for release, setting the stage for a treasure proposition.

sub_scenes.title: The Treasure Deal
sub_scenes.description: A prisoner proposes a deal to the Captain: treasure in exchange for escape.

sub_scenes.title: Betrayal and Revenge
sub_scenes.description: The Captain betrays the prisoner, taking the treasure for himself, leading to Jordan's vow of revenge.

narrative_arcs.title: Realization of Betrayal and Captain's Departure
Jordan's Outrage and Vow of Revenge
Years Pass, Freedom, and Pursuit of Revenge

sub_scenes.title: The Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Jordan tracks down the Captain, confronts him, and agrees to meet at his house for his share of the treasure.

narrative_arcs.title: Jordan's Vigil and the Officer's Departure

sub_scenes.title: Attic Betrayal and Fight
sub_scenes.description: At the Captain's house, Jordan confronts him, leading to a violent fight over the treasure in the attic.

narrative_arcs.title: Ascent to the Attic and Treasure Reveal

sub_scenes.title: Aftermath and Conclusion of Treasure Tale
sub_scenes.description: Police investigate the gunshot, leading to a chase and the Captain's desperate jump, followed by a narrator concluding the tale with a moral on money.

narrative_arcs.title: Sound of Gunfire and Initial Investigation
Concluding Monologue on Treasure and Evil

Major_Arcs.title: Vignettes and Haunted House
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc presents various vignettes of conflict, transitioning into a story about a haunted estate and its resolution through forgiveness and love.

sub_scenes.title: New Vignettes of Conflict
sub_scenes.description: Brief scenes depicting a room attack, a courtroom sentencing, and a declaration of hatred.

narrative_arcs.title: Attack and Intervention in a Room

sub_scenes.title: The Haunted Matthews Estate
sub_scenes.description: Introduction to the haunted Matthews estate and the arrival of investigator Mr. Northrup.

narrative_arcs.title: The Haunted Matthews Estate and the Investigator's Arrival

sub_scenes.title: Entering the Haunted House
sub_scenes.description: Mr. Northrup ignores warnings and enters the haunted house, encountering Vincent Matthews' ghost.

narrative_arcs.title: Ignoring the Warning and Entering the Haunted House
First Encounter with Vincent Matthews' Ghost

sub_scenes.title: Fight with Vincent Matthews
sub_scenes.description: Vincent Matthews attacks Mr. Northrup, leading to a physical confrontation and Northrup's escape.

sub_scenes.title: Philosophical Interlude and the Path to Salvation
sub_scenes.description: A philosophical discussion about violence, fear, and hate leads to the revelation that forgiveness and love from Rosalind are needed for salvation.

narrative_arcs.title: The Path to Salvation: Forgiveness and Love

sub_scenes.title: Summoning Rosalind
sub_scenes.description: Efforts to force a confrontation with Rosalind's spirit and her subsequent summoning.

narrative_arcs.title: Physical Subjugation and Assertion of Strength

sub_scenes.title: Forgiveness and Love
sub_scenes.description: Rosalind is presented to her brother, leading to forgiveness and a declaration of brotherly love.

sub_scenes.title: Resolution of the Haunting
sub_scenes.description: Rosalind and Vincent reconcile, express regret and gratitude, and depart for eternal rest, resolving the haunting.

Major_Arcs.title: Henry Hudson's Voyages
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc recounts the historical voyages of Henry Hudson, his quest for the Northwest Passage, and the tragic mutiny that ended his life.

sub_scenes.title: Henry Hudson's New Mission
sub_scenes.description: Introduction to the mystery of Henry Hudson's fate and the Dutch East India Company's proposition for a new voyage.

narrative_arcs.title: The Dutch East India Company's Proposition

sub_scenes.title: The Voyage and Disappointment
sub_scenes.description: Hudson's voyage faces crew discontent, exploration of the Hudson River, and eventual disappointment, leading to a return to Holland.

narrative_arcs.title: Crew's Discontent and Threat of Mutiny
Entering the Hudson River with Hope
Hudson's Reflection and Order to Return Home

sub_scenes.title: The Ill-Fated Voyage
sub_scenes.description: Hudson embarks on another voyage, which leads to his ship being trapped in ice and growing crew conflict.

narrative_arcs.title: Setting Sail Again for the Northwest Passage
Ship Stuck in Ice and Crew's Despair
The Ice Melts and Conflict Over Voyage Direction

sub_scenes.title: Mutiny and Consequences
sub_scenes.description: The crew mutinies, setting Hudson adrift, and face retribution upon their return.

narrative_arcs.title: Return and Reckoning for the Mutineers

Major_Arcs.title: The Arabian Knight
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc narrates the Arabian Knight Hassan's mission to rescue a kidnapped woman from the Tartar leader Kurgan, culminating in combat and romance.

sub_scenes.title: The Arabian Knight's Mission
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of Hassan and his mission from the Caliph to rescue a kidnapped woman from Kurgan.

sub_scenes.title: Journey and Warning
sub_scenes.description: Hassan sets out on his mission, encountering signs of Tartars at an oasis and receiving a dire warning from a traveler.

narrative_arcs.title: Hassan's Determined Journey to the Oasis
Encounter and Warning at the Oasis

sub_scenes.title: Infiltration and Intel Gathering
sub_scenes.description: Hassan infiltrates the Tartar camp in disguise, subdues a sentry, and overhears guards revealing the captive's location.

narrative_arcs.title: Inside the Camp and Gaining Intel

sub_scenes.title: Suspicion and Capture
sub_scenes.description: Hassan interacts with the captive daughter, but is quickly discovered by Tartar guards and captured.

narrative_arcs.title: Suspicion and Confrontation at the Tent

sub_scenes.title: The Challenge and Resolve
sub_scenes.description: Hassan is brought before Kurgan, interrogated, and challenged to a trial by combat, which he accepts with resolve.

sub_scenes.title: The Combat Begins
sub_scenes.description: The combat begins in the north field, with Hassan facing his three opponents and quickly defeating the first two using wit and agility.

narrative_arcs.title: Dirt in the Eyes and First Foe Down

sub_scenes.title: Combat Climax and Reward
sub_scenes.description: Hassan defeats the third barbarian, claims his reward from Kurgan, and earns Kurgan's respect.

narrative_arcs.title: Demanding the Reward and Kurgan's Praise

sub_scenes.title: Resolution and Romance
sub_scenes.description: Hassan and the woman depart, sharing farewells with Kurgan and developing a romantic connection.

narrative_arcs.title: Imminent Departure and The One Thing
